summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The City of Dallas will hold a special called meeting for the Tax Increment Financing Reinvestment Zone Number Nineteen (Cypress Waters TIF District) Board of Directors on January 30, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. The meeting will take place at Dallas City Hall and via videoconference. The primary purpose is to discuss and make decisions regarding the governance and operational matters of the Cypress Waters TIF District.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Establish a quorum and introduce participants.
2. Public comments on agenda items 5 through 7.
3. Nomination and election of a Vice Chairperson.
4. Review and approval of the Meeting Record from January 25, 2024.
5. Review and approval of the Cypress Waters TIF District Annual Report for Fiscal Year 2023-2024.
6. Review and approval of a quarterly meeting schedule for 2025.

**Important Details**:  
- The meeting will include a public comment period specifically for agenda items 5 to 7.
- The Annual Report for Fiscal Year 2023-2024 will be presented for approval, with a recommendation to forward it to the City Council.
- The proposed quarterly meeting schedule for 2025 will also be reviewed.

**Action Items**:  
The Board is seeking to:  
- Nominate and elect a Vice Chairperson.  
- Approve the Meeting Record from the previous meeting.  
- Approve the Annual Report and recommend it to the City Council.  
- Approve the quarterly meeting schedule for the upcoming year.  

This meeting will facilitate important governance decisions for the TIF District, impacting future development and financial planning.
